title: 64 Zoo Lane
resume: Lucy is a little girl who lives close to a zoo. Every night, the zoo  animals visit Lucy, tell her an exciting story and send her on a magical  night-time adventure. At the end of each story, the moral of the tale  is discussed,  then bedtime is declared, sending Lucy off for a cosy night's sleep.

Every night, the zoo  animals visit Lucy, tell her an exciting story and send her on a magical  night-time adventure. At the end of each story, the moral of the tale  is discussed,  then bedtime is declared, sending Lucy off for a cosy night's sleep.
